requisitos: C# .NET (3 to 5 years): experience developing .NET applications in a professional environment with an advanced understanding of the framework.
React (1 to 3 years): experience working with React applications in production. Familiarity with advanced concepts such as SPA and Entity Manager.
TypeScript: experience using the language, even if not in a frontend context.
SQL (3 to 5 years): experience with SQL Server. Ability to work directly with databases, not just through ORMs. Schema management.
HTML/CSS (3 to 5 years): advanced proficiency in HTML and CSS.
Docker: basic knowledge, experience running applications in containers.
Azure/AWS (focus on Azure): experience deploying applications in cloud environments and interacting with Azure or AWS services.
Strong knowledge of design patterns and software architecture.
Object-oriented programming.
Ability to describe and explain advanced architecture concepts
valorables: Queueing systems / Events (messaging): experience handling message queues (Kafka or similar).

requisitos: Backend: NestJS and/or Node JS

titulo: Mid Ruby on Rails Full Stack Dev
requisitos: At least 2 years of hands-on experience with Ruby on Rails technologies.
Capable of building complete web applications and applying object-oriented programming principles effectively.
Competent in writing efficient and optimized code, including creating and managing queries for relational databases.
Experienced in writing and maintaining unit tests, ensuring code quality, and integrating testing into development workflows.
Competent in managing version control workflows, including resolving conflicts and handling branching strategies in collaborative environments.
Capable of developing dynamic and responsive user interfaces, with an understanding of how to improve performance and accessibility.
Familiar with creating and managing containerized applications and coordinating multi-service environments.
valorables: Experience working with performance optimization techniques for front-end and back-end applications.
Familiarity with advanced testing strategies, such as integration or end-to-end testing.
Exposure to scalable deployment practices, including basic container orchestration tools.
Understanding of accessibility standards and how to apply them to user interfaces.
Experience mentoring junior developers or collaborating on team-wide best practices.

requisitos: 7+ years of hands-on experience with .NET technologies, including C#, ASP.NET, and related frameworks.
Proven experience in architecting complex software solutions, focusing on scalability, reliability, and maintainability.
Familiarity with cloud providers (Azure) and experience designing applications for cloud environments.
Strong knowledge of SQL (SQL Server) databases, with experience in data modeling and optimization.
In-depth knowledge of design patterns, software engineering best practices, and coding standards.
Experience working in Agile/Scrum environments, with a solid understanding of DevOps principles.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
valorables: Familiarity with front-end development using React.
Experience setting up and maintaining CI/CD pipelines.
Experience developing and maintaining ADB2C policies.

titulo: Sr Ruby on Rails Full Stack Dev
requisitos: At least 5 years of hands-on experience with Ruby on Rails technologies.
Expertise in designing scalable, complex web applications using Ruby on Rails, applying advanced object-oriented programming principles.
Demonstrated ability to architect, optimize, and manage high-performance relational and non-relational databases.
Skilled in defining and implementing comprehensive testing strategies, including robust test coverage and automation.
Proven experience in managing Git workflows, including version control strategies and mentoring team members in best practices.
Experienced in designing full-stack solutions by integrating dynamic frontends with scalable backends, ensuring maintainability and adherence to industry best practices.
Skilled in developing and scaling containerized applications using Docker, with experience in orchestration tools for deployment.
Track record of leading technical projects, solving complex challenges, and delivering performance-optimized solutions.
valorables: Advanced knowledge of DevOps processes, including CI/CD pipelines and scalable infrastructure management.
Hands-on experience with modern JavaScript frameworks for building dynamic, maintainable, and high-performance frontends.
Demonstrated ability to mentor and guide teams, contributing to technical decision-making at an organizational level.
Expertise in designing and managing cloud infrastructure, implementing advanced deployment strategies.
Familiarity with building and optimizing distributed database systems for scalability and reliability.
